Multivariable Calculus | Change of variables for multiple integrals.

change of variables\n[imath]\begin{array}{l}\n\iint f(x, y) d A= \\\n\quad \quad_{R} \iint_{R} f(x(u, v), y(u, v))\left|\frac{\partial(x, y)}{\partial(u, v)}\right| d \bar{A}\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]\iint f(x, y) d A= [/imath] [imath]\quad \quad_{R} \iint_{R} f(x(u, v), y(u, v))\left|\frac{\partial(x, y)}{\partial(u, v)}\right| d \bar{A}[/imath]
